column4: is there an I'll never buy ati or amd again channel somewhere?
This is probably the best you'll get.  I have a "legacy" card too, just be patient is all I can say.  the oss driver isn't THAT bad.
I am all fine with the free driver. I just need googleearth for my thesis

try #ati  also, do you have another os?  if worst comes to worst, you can make a partition of 8.10 where fglrx still supports your card and use that.  If you have a windows/osx install, just use that.
